content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>VT Department of Public Service (VPS)</origin> <pubdate>20070126</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>UtilityTelecom_CABLEMOD2005</title> <edition>2005A</edition> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <serinfo> <sername>Vermont Cable Systems 2005</sername> <issue>2005A</issue> </serinfo> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Waterbury VT 05676</pubplace> <publish>VT Department of Public Service (VPS)</publish> </pubinfo> <othercit>Tile Structure - STATE</othercit> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?layer=UtilityTelecom_CABLEMOD2005</onlink> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?layer=UtilityTelecom_CABLEMOD2005&mapit=yes</onlink> <onlink>http://maps.vcgi.org:8080/wmsconnector/com.esri.wms.Esrimap?servicename=DATAWARE_VCGI&VERSION=1.1.1&request=getmap&BBOX=-73.45416,42.72279,-71.46528,45.018356&SRS=EPSG:4326&LAYERS=UTILITY_CABLEMOD2005_LINE&WIDTH=300&HEIGHT=400&FORMAT=image/gif</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> The VT Cable Modem dataset (CABLEMOD2005) includes lines depicting the extent of Vermont's cable modem broadband system as of 12/31/2005. This data layer was generated by extracting a subset of features from UtilityTelecom_CABLE2005.  The following subset was used:  CABLECO = Adelphia, Charter, Duncan Cable, Jeffersonville, North Country Cable, Smuggler's Notch, Southern Vermont Cable, Stowe Cablevision, or Transvideo.  These represent cable companies which also provide broadband "cable modem" service within their territory. </abstract> <purpose>To represent the extent of Vermont's Cable Modem Broadband System as of 12/31/2005.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20051231</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Ground Conditions</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Annually</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-73.454162</westbc> <eastbc>-71.465281</eastbc> <northbc>45.018361</northbc> <southbc>42.722789</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>utilitiesCommunication</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>cable system</themekey> <themekey>broadband</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>Vermont</placekey> </place> <temporal> <tempkt>None</tempkt> <tempkey>2005</tempkey> </temporal> </keywords> <accconst>VCGI, VPS, and the State of VT make no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data.</accconst> <useconst>None.  This data should be used for general planning purposes only.  This data should be used with caution since it may not reflect the reality on the ground.</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Chris Campbell</cntper> <cntorg>VT Department of Public Service</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>Director - Telecommunications</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and Physical Address</addrtype> <address>112 State Street, Drawer 20</address> <city>Montpelier</city> <state>VT</state> <postal>05620-2701</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>802-828-4074</cntvoice> <cnttdd>None</cnttdd> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://maps.vcgi.org:8080/wmsconnector/com.esri.wms.Esrimap?servicename=DATAWARE_VCGI&VERSION=1.1.1&request=getmap&BBOX=-73.45416,42.72279,-71.46528,45.018356&SRS=EPSG:4326&LAYERS=UTILITY_CABLEMOD2005_LINE&WIDTH=300&HEIGHT=400&FORMAT=image/gif</browsen> <browsed>GIF</browsed> <browset>GIF</browset> </browse> <datacred>VPS, VCGI, and cable companies</datacred> <secinfo> <secsys>N/A</secsys> <secclass>Unclassified</secclass> <sechandl>No Security Considerations</sechandl> </secinfo> <native>Arc/Info</native> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>Has not been assessed.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic> Cable lines owned and run by Adelphia (now Comcast) were provided provided to VPS by Adelphia and loaded directly into the database without review.  The remaining lines feature are updates to CABLE2003.  Paper maps provided by the cable companies were used to update this feature class.  It is consistent with the information submitted by the cable companies to VPS.  However, it should be noted that the origins of CABLE2003 are unknown. </logic> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>Has not been accessed.  Variable accuracy.  Caution should be used.</horizpar> </horizpa> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>VT Department of Public Servcie</origin> <pubdate>20070126</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>VT Cable Systems 2005</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Montpelier, VT</pubplace> </pubinfo> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>Various</srcscale> <typesrc>Various</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20051231</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>Publication Date</srccurr> </srctime> <srccontr>Numerous VT cable companies submitted data to VPS for integration into this data layer.</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc> VPS submitted the existing 2003 UtilityTelecom_CABLE2003 data to VCGI.  Hardcopy maps provided by each cable company were also forwarded to VCGI (Charter, Jeffersonville, North Country, Southern VT Cable, Stowe Cablevisison, Transvideo, White Mountain Cable).  The only exception was Adelphia (Comcast), which submitted a statewide shapefile of their cable system.  Other cable companies did not submit information to VPS.  The reason for this is unknown.  VCGI used the hardcopy maps submitted by the cable companies to updated the 2003 data to reflect VT's cable system as of 12/31/2005.  VCGI made its best interpretation of the maps, however, inaccuracy should be expected.  A subset of features were extracted to create CABLEMOD2005. </procdesc> <procdate>20070126</procdate> <proctime>Unknown</proctime> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Steve Sharp</cntper> <cntorg>VCGI</cntorg> </cntperp> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>LINE</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <ptvctinf> <sdtsterm> <sdtstype>Complete chain</sdtstype> <ptvctcnt>10000</ptvctcnt> </sdtsterm> </ptvctinf> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <planar> <gridsys> <gridsysn>State Plane Coordinate System</gridsysn> <spcs> 1983</horizdn> <ellips>Geodetic Reference System 80</ellips> <semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis> <denflat>1 / 298.25722210</denflat> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo> <detailed> <enttyp>
